pullRequest.title: Some progress on failing runtime fields tests
pullRequest.bodyText:
This breaks apart the a test for the terms aggregation into one that
work for runtime fields and one that doesn't.

commit.message:
Some progress on failing runtime fields tests

This breaks apart the a test for the `terms` aggregation into one that
work for runtime fields and one that doesn't.

nodes.bodyText: I see only one test added here, so I don't follow what is being split. Also, would it make sense to make the test changes to master directly?
nodes.diffHunk:

   - match: { indices.test_1.total.fielddata.memory_size_in_bytes: 0}
 
+---
+"Global ordinals are loaded with the global_ordinals execution hint":
+
+  - do:
+      index:
+        refresh: true
+        index: test_1
+        id: 1
+        routing: 1
+        body: { "str": "abc" }
+
+  - do:

+        refresh: true

+        id: 2
